channel.title: PyQt5 on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in PyQt5 on Memo Tut

item.title: Introduction to PyQt
item.description: # Qt 5.14 Release! ! I’m sorry for the story that has nothing to do with the theme. Everyone, Qt 5.14 has been released! ! ![Screenshot 2019-12-14 22.02.19.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/62136/a837169e-4959-ff53-5520-(2ab15686293e.png) When I tried to install Qt for the first time in a while, I noticed (I actually noticed when I was with hermit…). I thought I’d try to install 5.14 immediately, but this time I thought that LTS latest 5.12.6 was safe considering compatibility with binding tools etc.
